timeline.bodyText: Are location and comment also need a non-null value? Glue doesn't require user to set values for these fields in the database?
timeline.author: HelloHorizon

replies.bodyText: Not sure, but those fields were already annotated to be @Nullable so I am assuming it is ok to be null.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: The glue UDB handles the NPE for parameters, do we want to check it again here?
timeline.author: HelloHorizon

replies.bodyText: The reason I put that here, was because this field was not classified as @Nullable, so I am enforcing that here.
replies.author: gpang
